page.title: 07EDUCATION IN WOLSTON
page.content: There are two schools, Wolston High School providing{education}for 330 12-16 year olds and Wolston First School for 151 3-8 year olds. 8-12 year olds go to Binley Woods Middle School 2.5 miles away. For First School children a{school day}is 6.25 hours long, including lunchtime, and incorporates many different tasks. Most of the children's activities are undertaken with the same teacher, the first school having five{classes}each with its own teacher and including a nursery class of 3 and 4 year olds, who come to school morning or afternoon only. At Wolston High School, the children are timetabled to move to different teachers for different{subject lessons}during their seven hour day. This school is housed in a large three-storey building with a huge playing field for games.
